hellojosh

Hello. My name is Joshua Kemmerling and I build mobile and web stuff and live in Austin, TX.

I am currently a senior UI developer at Projekt202, an interactive agency located in Austin, TX specializing in user-centered software design and development.

All of my code get published to Github and you can see my work history on LinkedIn.

I may or may not be working on something else so stay tuned.

I am addicted to pizza, cheeseburgers and Sunkist orange soda. I play guitar, all sports and video games periodically.
